name: server
description: Path Genie is an interactive web application that helps users create personalized learning paths based on a topic of interest. By entering a title (e.g., "Learn Python Programming"), users can generate a detailed, visual learning path using the **React Flow** library. The application leverages the **Sonar API by Perplexity** to fetch relevant learning resources, including YouTube videos, blogs, articles, and more, to enrich the learning experience.
author: omiii
